name: Family Guy: A Freakin' RPG!
description:
Go on a wacky adventure as your favorite characters from the wacky animated comedy FAMILY GUY!!!!!

FEATURE:

- A life changing experience.

- Okay-ish combat

- The game is as long as an actual family guy episode! (kinda)

- Pop Culture references that'd only be funny if you know what they're referencing (JUST LIKE THE SHOW)

- Cutaway gags (JUST LIKE THE SHOW)

INSTALL OR IM GOING TO FUCKING KILL YOU
